description:
Displays data from the phone's GPS unit. 'Get Position' displays your current position.  'Start Tracking' continuously updates the position display.
This app simply displays the data that the GPS unit gives it without any sort of filtering, which means that it will not wait for more accurate information before displaying it.  If you turn on Tracking, the accuracy will tend to get better over time as the GPS unit locks on to more satellites.  If you need accurate positioning don't use 'Get Position'. This starts a new GPS session every time it's clicked & returns the first set of data available, which is not likely to be accurate.

For more features, check out 'SimpleGPS Pro' and 'SimpleGPS Plus' in the App Catalog. Please read the help of this app for more info.

v1.1.8:
- Updated to reflect code changes in the Plus and Pro version.
v1.1.7:
- Updated for the Pre3.
v1.1.6:
- Added option to allow velocity to use a different unit system from the other data.
- Updated Help screen to reflect new features in SimpleGPS Pro.
v1.1.5:
- Added option to automatically start tracking when the app launches.
- Unified the code base with the new SimpleGPS Pro app.
v1.1.4:
- Added option to display latitude and longitude in GPS format (DDD° MM.MMMM')
v1.1.3:
- Added option to display latitude and longitude in time format (DDD° MM' SS.SSSS")
- Added 'Change log' button in help screen.
v1.1.2:
- Added option to display velocity as kph/mph
v1.1.1:
- Added subject to support email link
v1.1.0:
- Copy GPS data to clipboard
- Preferences screen
- Help screen
